overview: Veronica, a 27-year-old black woman, runs her house very well. Veronica has a college degree in corporate law and works for a popular firm. Darnell is a freelance photographer. A series of moments changes the course of the marriage. Veronica has choices to make as she decides whether she wants to continue on the path she's on in her marriage or learn to become a stronger woman.
tagline: Life is a series of moments
title: Strong Black Woman
